subject: Fix sample image loading and removal bugs
body:
- Fix removeImage: was checking wrong property (cellImages stores IDs directly, not objects)
- Add imageCells: [0] to default layout state so loadSampleImage can find image cells on initial load

https://claude.ai/code/session_01HZt7SXYRodiKgWRiU7R4yL
title: Fix sample image loading and removal bugs
